name: My World Is Jelly
description:
Objective :
Kill the Space Jellyfishes before they reach the planet.
Dont let them touch you…
They will turn you into jelly.

_____________

Controls:

wasd – movement
Q – Orbital View
Right Mouse button – shoot
Left Mouse button – aim and stabilize
shift – run

___________

Jogo por René Machado, Gonçalo Osório, Gabriel Silva e Mateus Branco
